volunteer_signup_confirmation.subject: Thank You for Volunteering with {{organization_name}}
volunteer_signup_confirmation.body_html:
Welcome {{first_name}}!

Thank you for your interest in volunteering with {{organization_name}}.

We've received your application and will review it shortly. Here's what you submitted:

  • Name: {{first_name}} {{last_name}}
  • Email: {{email}}
  • Phone: {{phone}}
  • Availability: {{availability}}

Next Steps:

  1. Our volunteer coordinator will review your application
  2. You'll receive an email within 2-3 business days
  3. We'll schedule an orientation session

If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact us.

Best regards,
The {{organization_name}} Team

donation_thank_you.subject: Thank You for Your Generous Donation to {{organization_name}}
donation_thank_you.body_html:
Dear {{first_name}},

Thank you for your generous donation of ${{amount}} to {{organization_name}}!

Your support helps us continue our mission to {{mission_statement}}.

Donation Details:

  • Amount: ${{amount}}
  • Date: {{date}}
  • Reference: {{submission_id}}

This email serves as your donation receipt for tax purposes. {{organization_name}} is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization. EIN: {{ein_number}}

Your donation makes a real difference in our community. Thank you for being part of our mission!

With gratitude,
{{organization_name}}

event_registration_confirmation.body_html:
Hi {{first_name}},

You're all set for {{event_name}}!

Event Details:

  • Date: {{event_date}}
  • Time: {{event_time}}
  • Location: {{event_location}}
  • Number of Attendees: {{attendee_count}}

What to Bring:

  • This confirmation email
  • Photo ID
  • {{additional_items}}

We're looking forward to seeing you there!

If you need to cancel or modify your registration, please contact us at {{contact_email}}.

See you soon,
The {{organization_name}} Events Team

support_request_received.subject: Support Request Received - {{organization_name}}
support_request_received.body_html:
Hello {{first_name}},

We've received your request for support from {{organization_name}}.

Request Type: {{support_type}}

Your Situation:

{{situation_description}}

What Happens Next:

  1. A member of our support team will review your request
  2. We'll contact you within 1-2 business days
  3. We'll work together to determine the best way to help

If this is an emergency, please call our hotline at {{emergency_phone}}.

We're here to help.

Warm regards,
The {{organization_name}} Support Team
